title: 4 Ways AI Transformed Music, Movies and Art in 2023
description: From Drake impersonators to the Hollywood strike, AI provoked both enthusiasm and panic across the entertainment world.

title: Clarence Thomas Has Recused Himself Before. Will He Do it in Trump’s Colorado Ballot Case?
description: Thomas already recused himself from a court decision in October related to efforts to overturn the 2020 election.

title: IRS to Waive $1 Billion in Penalties for People and Firms Owing Back Taxes for 2020 or 2021
description: The IRS temporarily suspended mailing automated reminders to pay overdue tax bills during the pandemic.

title: U.S. and Venezuela Swap Maduro Ally for 10 Americans and Fugitive Contractor ‘Fat Leonard’
description: The deal represents the U.S. government’s boldest bid to improve relations with the major oil-producing nation.

title: Understanding Pregnancy Loss Was Supposed to Improve Health Outcomes—Not Lead to Punishment
description: Assessing pregnancy loss used to be about improving health care. Now it's a tool for punishment.

title: Rite Aid Banned From Facial Recognition Tech Use for 5 years After Faulty Theft Targeting in Stores
description: Rite Aid said that it disagrees with the allegations, but that it's glad it reached an agreement to resolve the issue.

title: Your Questions About the Colorado Trump Ruling, Answered
description: The Colorado Supreme Court ruled that former President Donald Trump is ineligible for election. Here's what happens now.

title: Gaza Is Being Made Unlivable
description: NGOs can help keep people alive but we can't clear the shattered remains of whole cities or raise homes and infrastructure from rubble.

title: Hamas Leader Visits Cairo Amid Talks of Another Gaza Ceasefire and Hostage Swap
description: Hamas’ top leader traveled to Cairo for talks on the war in Gaza, part of a flurry of diplomacy aimed at securing another ceasefire.

title: Maestro’s Scenes from an Open Marriage
description: Bradley Cooper depicts Leonard Bernstein and Felicia Montealegre's nonmonogamous marriage in a surprisingly modern light.

title: The Top 10 Fashion Moments of 2023
description: From Rihanna at the Super Bowl to stealth wealth, these moments defined the year in fashion.

title: Meta’s Review Board Rules to Reinstate Two Video Posts About the Israel-Hamas War
description: A review board has ruled that Facebook parent company Meta should overturn two decisions it made  to remove posts of the Israel-Hamas war.

title: The 39 Most Anticipated Movies of 2024
description: From Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga to Dune: Part Two, here are the most anticipated movies to look out for in 2024.

title: Why The World Must Set a Price on Carbon
description: At the COP28 climate conference nations missed an opportunity to set a global price on carbon—a key tool for ensuring a just transition.

title: TIME Appoints Dan Macsai as Chief Events Officer
description: TIME Editor in Chief Sam Jacobs sent the below memo to staff on Wednesday: Dear all, I am so thrilled to announce that, in addition to his role as Executive Editor, Dan Macsai is being promoted from Vice President, TIME Events, to Chief Events Officer. In 2023, there’s been no more significant transformation of how…

title: Action News Helicopter Crashes in New Jersey, Killing a Pilot and Photographer
description: Action News’ helicopter Chopper 6, carrying a pilot and a photographer from the Action News team, crashed into a wooded area of New Jersey.

title: Biden’s Challenge for 2024
description: Joe Biden heads into 2024 with worse polling than any President since Jimmy Carter at this point in his first term.

title: How Bradley Cooper Wove My Parents’ Truth into the Fabric of Maestro
description: Leonard Bernstein's oldest child on how Bradley Cooper captured the essence of her parents in the movie 'Maestro.'

title: ‘Sick Shaming’ at the Office Leads to Overuse of Cold Medicine Among U.S. Workers
description: As the pandemic has receded, Americans face pressure to show up for work and social gatherings, yet even the hint of a sniffle can be enough to brand someone an outcast.

title: How Republicans Are Reacting to the Colorado Ruling to Remove Trump From the Ballot
description: Trump’s fellow candidates, his allies, GOP members of Congress, and right-leaning commentators are lambasting the decision as a Democratic Party attack on democracy.

title: Donald Trump Banned From 2024 Ballot in Colorado After Historic Ruling by State Court
description: Trump’s attorneys had promised to appeal any disqualification immediately to the nation's highest court, which has the final say about constitutional matters.

title: The 31 Most Anticipated TV Shows of 2024
description: Next year includes new shows like 'The Sympathizer' and 'Expats,' along with returning seasons of 'True Detective' and 'Bridgerton.'
